issue.title: Filter mine / those of other
issue.body:
**Original author :** Villemagne Jérôme

Following #895:

it could be nice/necessary be able to filter items list (resources, requests...) on users.

Variants:
* the filter could be a simple choice between 'mine' and 'those of other'
* the filter could be a multiselectable users choice

The filter should be updated regarding the organism filter (#933)

Roles on which the filter should match by screen:
* resources : resource manager (2)
* pricing : pricing manager (9)
* requests : extraction responsible (7)
* thirdparty validation: validation manager (10)

For orders, the filter should match the user which processed the order

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Jérôme, can you give to the TC more details about this proposal?
